CustomField.formula: AND(SF_SoldTo_Contact__r.AccountId <> Id, SF_SoldTo_Contact__r.AccountId <> Parent.Id, SF_SoldTo_Contact__r.AccountId != null) || AND(SF_BillTo_Contact__r.AccountId <> Id, SF_BillTo_Contact__r.AccountId <> Parent.Id, SF_BillTo_Contact__r.AccountId != null) || AND(SF_Venue_Contact__r.AccountId <> Id, SF_Venue_Contact__r.AccountId <> Parent.Id, SF_Venue_Contact__r.AccountId != null) || AND(Primary_Contact__r.AccountId <> Id, Primary_Contact__r.AccountId <> Parent.Id, Primary_Contact__r.AccountId != null)
CustomField.label: Contact Lookup Filter Error
